events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your store but would like to request a refund as it does not fit me properly.
The system has categorized this issue as a refund request based on the customer's message mentioning a refund.
Support agent Emma has been assigned to handle the refund request case for the customer.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I understand you would like to request a refund for your recent purchase. I am here to help.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason for the refund so that I can assist you further?
The order number is 789456123, and the jacket does not fit me as expected. I tried to see if it could be exchanged but would prefer a refund.
I have processed your refund request. You will receive an email with instructions on how to return the jacket, and the amount will be refunded to your original payment method.
Thank you for the quick response! I appreciate the help and will follow the return instructions as soon as I receive the email.
The refund process has been completed successfully on our end. Please allow a few days for the amount to reflect in your account.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received your refund and that everything was resolved to your satisfaction.
We are closing this support case as the refund issue has been successfully handled and no further assistance is needed.
